quote_list.quote: Not only did they help us develop the right plan and present it to local and state officials, but they created an informative booklet outlining the process and assisted us in effectively presenting our plan to the public as well.
quote_list.author: Dr. Susan Andrews, Superintendent Muscogee County Schools

quote_list.quote: The work your group has done and continues to do is amazing. I am so thankful!
quote_list.author: Pam Nail, Chief Academic Officer Douglas County School System

quote_list.quote: In 2016, Education Planners conducted a year-long Secondary School Facility Planning & Feasibility Study that looked at the capacity needs of our middle schools and high schools and provided specific recommendations for facility improvements. The Education Planners team led an extensive effort to gather feedback from district stakeholders through numerous steering committee and community meetings, as well as surveys. Their final recommendations helped shape the District's $561 million E-SPLOST V Capital Improvement Program. Education Planners' comprehensive stakeholder research and thorough programing efforts helped the District gain a 71% approval rate of its E-SPLOST V program, the highest in District history.
quote_list.author: Joshua Williams, Chief Operating Officer DeKalb County School District

quote_list.quote: Your support for Exceptional Education was outstanding. We will act on your study of that department and as always, your work was fantastic.
quote_list.author: John F. Harper, Ed.D, Superintendent Bartow County School District
